articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Darvel sprung a surprise in the third round of the Scottish Cup with a 5-2 win away at League One outfit Montrose.
articles.title: Scottish Cup wrap: Darvel march on as history-making Stirling Uni eye up tie against Premiership opposition

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: There will always be the biggest of black marks placed against this Qatar World Cup.
articles.title: World Cup 2022: How Qatar 'brand' being fed through the shredder could yet salvage these finals

articles.author: Alison McConnell
articles.description: As adverts go, this one could have done with a little airbrushing.
articles.title: Rangers and Celtic fail to draw in box office numbers as bragging rights are shared

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The gritty scene assured by a dreich day at Maryhill Juniors’ Lochburn Park, on a quagmire pitch, might seem as removed as possible from a World Cup extravaganza played out within a pristine arena and surface.
articles.title: ‘Just geez Celtic or Rangers up here and we’ll do them’ - Drumchapel United deliver greatest day with Scottish Cup win that has beaten opponents Edinburgh calling out SFA

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Watching Australia defeat Tunisia 1-0 at the World Cup, and in particular taking note of Harry Souttar’s colossal performance in the centre of the Socceroos’ defence, it would easy to say that Scotland let one slip through their fingers.
articles.title: Australia's Harry Souttar sparkles in huge win - 'not turning back on Scotland', classy Celtic man, Martin Boyle raises crutches in huddle

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Watching Australia defeat Tunisia 1-0 at the World Cup, and in particular taking note of Harry Souttar’s colossal performance in the centre of the Socceroos’ defence, it would easy to say that Scotland let one slip through their fingers.
articles.title: Australia's Harry Souttar sparkles in huge win - 'not turning back on Scotland', classy Celtic man, Martin Boyle on crutches in huddle

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: It may feel like Scottish football is in cold storage due to the World Cup, but that is far from the truth as one of the oldest competitions in the world takes centre stage this weekend.
articles.title: When is the Scottish Cup fourth round draw? Full details as Rangers, Celtic, Hearts, Hibs and Premiership clubs enter competition

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: ‘You couldn’t write the script!’ is an oft-used commentator’s observation, screeched at moments of high, unexpected drama.
articles.title: Scotland v England: The big missed Qatar opportunity but why World Cup owes everything to 150 years ago

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Alistair Johnson says he is “excited” to be linked with a move to Celtic and revealed that his phone has been “blowing up” with all the messages he has been receiving about the potential transfers.
articles.title: Alistair Johnson breaks Celtic transfer silence - 'my phone has been blowing up'

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: The Scottish Football Association have announced that Martin Black has been appointed as its new compliance officer.
articles.title: SFA appoints Martin Black as new compliance officer - background, previous role and what he had to say on new job

articles.author: Ross McLeish
articles.description: Celtic are now on the verge on signing Canadian right-back Alistair Johnston after reaching a “verbal agreement” with his club Montreal CF.
articles.title: Transfer expert says Celtic have made major Alistair Johnson breakthrough - now down to 'final details'

articles.author: Graham Falk
articles.description: Can you name these 12 Scottish Football grounds and the clubs that play there?
articles.title: Scottish Football Quiz: How many of these 12 Scottish football grounds can you name?

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Celtic are in advanced talks to sign Montreal right-back Alistair Johnston, according to media reports in his homeland.
articles.title: Alistair Johnston to Celtic: 'Nothing done yet', sell-on fee, what Montreal player had to say on future

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Alistair William Johnston. A name which would be perfect for a fictional Scotland national team. Yet, at the World Cup playing in Qatar, an Alistair William Johnston represents Canada.
articles.title: Alistair Johnston: Celtic target different to Josip Juranovic, how he fared v Eden Hazard, €6m value

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The women’s game within Scottish football has made great strides across the last five years. There has been qualification for both the European Championship and World Cup. The national side has made Hampden Park its home and attracted big crowds, while players can be found at the likes of Real Madrid, Chelsea and in America.
articles.title: Glasgow and Edinburgh derbies, ultras and record attendance in store as SWPL prepares to take centre stage

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Celtic are considering a move for Canada's impressive defender Alistair Johnston – and he could act as a replacement for Josip Juranovic.
articles.title: Celtic at 'advanced' stage of signing £800k World Cup star - and he could be Josip Juranovic replacement

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Germany may have joined Argentina in the ranks of the humbled through losing their World Cup opener, succumbing in remarkable fashion to Japan.
articles.title: Germany shocked by Daizen Maeda's Japan at World Cup as hands over mouth protest takes centre stage

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Matchsticks might well be required to wedge open eyelids by any scouts that choose to analyse Croatia’s World Cup opener with Morocco as they weigh up a potential move for Celtic’s Josip Juranovic.
articles.title: Josip Juranovic Celtic sale value unmoved after Croatia World Cup stalemate

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Matchsticks might well be required to wedge open eyelids by any scouts that choose to analyse Croatia’s World Cup opener with Morocco as they weigh up a potential move for Celtic’s Josip Juranovic.

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic have confirmed the signing of Japenese defender Yuki Kobayashi, subject to international clearance.
articles.title: Celtic complete first January signing as Japanese contingent increases to five

articles.author: Graham Falk
articles.description: Newcastle United and England full back Kieran Trippier has spoken about a training ground altercation with former Celtic player Ross Wallace which left him needing stitches.
articles.title: 'Former Celtic player headbutted me' reveals England World Cup 2022 star

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou has fired an ominous warning to league rivals ahead of the January transfer window, insisting “we’ll definitely be stronger”.
articles.title: 'We'll definitely be stronger' - Ange Postecoglou delivers Celtic transfer ambition for January

articles.author: Graham Falk
articles.description: It’s time for our annual top 30 list! Once again, we asked a panel of Scottish Women’s Premier League managers, coaches, players, journalists and experts for their top 10 SWPL players of 2022. Here is who they picked.
articles.title: SWPL: The 30 best players in the Scottish Women's Premier League 2022 - including Rangers, Celtic, Glasgow City, Hibs and Hearts
